nodes.text: Walker 693 was an All Terrain Defense Pod operated by Imperial combat drivers of the Imperial Army. During a search for the insurgents in a town located on the planet Lothal, the walker was hijacked by the rebels in their attempt to find their captured leader, Kanan Jarrus. C1-10P, the mechanic member of the team accessed to the walker's computer to find information, only learning that the Empire had taken down their entire data network on Lothal. As their attempt to gain information of Jarrus failed, the team called Hera Syndulla for pickup, and managed to board the Phantom just before the walker was destroyed by Imperial reinforcements.
